content: This was an very interesting talk, providing a great introduction to Chaos Engineering concepts, good advice with Do’s and Don’ts and a clear path to reliability (Scan, Baseline, Analyze & Plan, Harden and Report) by Kolton Andrus from Gremlin, Inc. Don’t hesitate to register to the #ChaosConf there are still 2 days full of interesting topics to come!
